remarks: The value of an operation class abstraction.  Variant of ~ ovmpt2ga which does not require ` D ` and ` x ` to be distinct.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Dec-2013.)
statement:
ovmpt2x.1 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> R = S ) $.
ovmpt2x.2 $e |- ( x = A -> D = L ) $.
ovmpt2x.3 $e |- F = ( x e. C , y e. D |-> R ) $.
ovmpt2x $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. L /\ S e. H ) -> ( A F B ) = S ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d S x y $.
